name: Escape from Lunar Fortress
description:
Moon?

The Nazis established a military base on the moon!

You must find a way to escape from here!

Summon allied ships to escape from here!

DISCLAIMER:

This game tackles some sensitive/disturbing themes so make sure to read the disclaimer at the beginning of the game before you decide to play further.

CONTROLS:
  • WASD +Mouse - Movement
  • C - Crouch（The enemy won't detect you）
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Shift - Sprint
Install instructions

+Download the file.
+Decompress the zip.
+Execute the ".exe"
+Enjoy the game.

Tips

Better results when wearing headphones

Or turn up the volume
